reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater dress beautiful and well-made, appreciating its soft, form-fitting style that hits at the knees.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute!
items.body: This dress is very flattering and fits really well. I love the material because it is really soft, thick and also warm. The color is exactly what I expected! Very good for the price! Read more
items.author: Candra Livsey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great dress
items.body: Great fit. True to size. Soft material. A good wear for work or any other event. I may purchase in other colors. Quality is excellent. Material is warm and not too thin. Read more
items.author: Leah N

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply elegant
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater dress! The fabric is soft, cozy, and perfect for crisp fall days, yet it still feels breathable enough to wear indoors without overheating. The fit is flattering, snug in all the right places but with just enough stretch to move comfortably. I’ve worn it with boots and a scarf for a casual look, and dressed it up with heels and jewelry for an evening out. The quality is excellent; it holds its shape after washing and doesn’t pill. I’ve already received several compliments, and it’s quickly become my go-to outfit this season. Stylish, versatile, and comfortable. Its everything I wanted this fall!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Definitely not a sweater dress, 90% polyester & 10% spandex, BUT it’s soo soft! I’m 5’1” & 110. Ordered a small & it fits great. Hits 4-5 inches above my knees, so definitely not too short. I thought this was a good price for this dress. I was a little disappointed in the color. I It is more of a suntan color which is disappointing. I do like the pattern! No pockets for those wondering. Other than the color discrepancy, great dress. (I did take 1 star off because of the color. I have to adjust other things I was planning on wearing with it.) Read more
items.author: Stacy D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great winter dress
items.body: So cute and has POCKETS!? what a win. Fit just right for the value? This was a comfortable dress and the quality was better then expected for a lighter weight dress. Read more
items.author: Jolene Conn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm
items.body: Super cute and really warm material. Fit good and hit my mommy pooch. Read more
items.author: Nadia Harbanuk

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Comfortable
items.body: I wore this dress for the first time today and it is so comfortable. The fabric is nice and soft, not thin or bulky, and the flared skirt is cute. Read more
items.author: Charity

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Sweater Dress
items.body: I really love this long-sleeve, knee-length sweater dress. The material feels high-quality, soft, warm, and not itchy at all. The color was exactly as described, which I always appreciate when ordering clothing online. I’m 5'3" and 115 lbs, and the size I ordered fit perfectly. It’s true to size and the length hit right at my knees, which gives it a really flattering look. It’s a great option for multiple occasions. It also works perfectly for slightly cooler weather since the fabric has a nice weight without feeling too heavy. The dress holds its shape nicely throughout the day and is easy to style with boots, flats, or a belt if you want to add more shape. Overall, a great piece that I’d definitely order again in more colors! Read more
items.author: J.T.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, A Black, Burgundy, Olive Green, Dark Grey, Print 1, Apricot, Print 2, Teal Blue, Navy Blue, White, Plaid 2, Beige, Plaid 1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
